comment.author: 99684904@N00
comment._content: Wyver is probably a mistake. The Dutch name is Hofvijver, 'Court Pond'. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binnenhof

comment.author: 13321017@N03
comment._content: Yes, please rename this picture, it is called 'vijver' or 'hofvijver'.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks! The name you provided is now in the title and a subject note.  Leaving the designation "Wyver," too, since it's printed as part of the gold-lettered title on this old photochrom view.
